title: [NA] Silver Tournament Team: Seeking JGL, ADC/SUP
body:
Team Name : **Team Elo Complexity **
Tournament Website : **[Compete League :: Bronze & Silver League](https://lol.competeleague.com/#/leagues-silver-premier)**
Tournament Stream : **[Compete League Twitch Stream](https://www.twitch.tv/competeleague)**
TLDR; Below is a lot of information about our team and the league we are in. Our application for our team is at the bottom of this page.


**MUST BE ABLE TO MAKE PRACTICE AT 5PM PST M-F**
If you were gold last season don't apply. 


FILL OUT THE FORUM TO BE ADDED

Don't add me in game. 


About the League : Compete League is a tournament league open to all divisions of play. We play in the Bronze & Silver League. There is a Premier League and Open League. To play in the Open League, our team needs a complete team of Five players. You can think of the open league as a 'Practice' and 'Scrim' league that you play in before the premier league. The next season for the premier league begins in June. We plan to play in this league. As a team, we will need to play against other teams in the Open League and qualify for a spot in the premier league.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Days : Each Monday of the month, between the times of **4:30 PM** to **8:00 PM** Pacific Standard Time (Possibility of later nights based on game length) Game day schedule subject to change based on tournament admins discretion.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**What I am Looking For:**


Be on 5:00 PM PST for Practice.
Able to play at a high caliber competitively.
Willing to accept a try-outs whether they be 1 game or 10.
Able to adapt and adjust play styles to fit the team, composition, and enemy team.
Excel in communication with a team of Four others to achieve positive outcomes on Discord.
Able to provide positive reinforcement and critique for yourself as well as team members in constructive manners.
An open schedule with room to work.
Between the divisions of Bronze 5 and Silver 1.
If you are interested, we ask that you fill out our short Q&A in a post below.

Thank you, 
Fiasivimadoh

Recruiting:

Top: Fiasivimadoh (Subs Needed)
JGL: Open
MID: BigDad123 (Subs Needed)
ADC: Shwakam/ Open
SUP: Shwakam/ Open

Shwakam plays both roles extremely well just looking for someone who can play well with him.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Looks like you main another role either than support. Sorry Mult, looking for people who actually play their roles consistently.
